IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: To provide financial support for catholic education provided to students attending schools located in Missoula county, Montana.
IRS990.MissionDesc: To provide financial support for catholic education provided to students attending schools located in Missoula county, Montana.
IRS990.Desc: The Missoula catholic schools foundation exists to provide financial support for catholic education provided to students attending schools located in Missoula county, Montana. The mission serves approximately 496 students representing approximately 364 families.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Part V, Line 4: Intended uses of the endowment fund.
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: USE OF THE ENDOWMENT FUNDS ARE SPECIFIED BY THE DONEE. THEY INCLUDE TUITION ASSISTANCE FOR NEEDY STUDENTS ATTENDING CATHOLIC SCHOOLS IN MISSOULA, MT.

MCSF IS A TAX-EXEMPT ORGANIZATION UNDER SECTION 501(C)(3) OF THE INTERNAL REVENUE CODE. ACCORDINGLY, NO PROVISION FOR INCOME TAXES HAS BEEN RECORDED IN THESE FINANCIAL STATEMENTS AS MCSF BELIEVES IT HAD NO INCOME UNRELATED TO ITS EXEMPT PURPOSES IN 2023 OR 2022. WITH FEW EXCEPTIONS, MCSF'S INFORMATIONAL RETURN (I.R.S. FORM 990) IS NOT SUBJECT TO EXAMINATION BY TAX AUTHORITIES FOR YEARS PRIOR TO 2020.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Part XII, Line 2d: Other expenses and losses per audited F/S
Form 990, Part VI, Section B, Line 11b
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: PREPARATION AND REVIEW OF THE 990 IS THE RESPONSBILITY OF THE CONTROLLER. THE FINANCE COMMITTEE OF THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS PERFORMS AN IN-DEPTH REVIEW OF THE 990 ALONG WITH THE CONTROLLER. THE FULL BOARD IS PROVIDED COPIES OF THE 990 FOR THEIR REVIEW AND COMMENT PRIOR TO THE FILING OF THE FORM.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, Line 12c
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: SUPERVISORS AND THE FOUNDATION'S DIRECTOR MONITOR EMPLOYEES AND BOARD MEMBERS FOR COMPLIANCE AS PART OF THEIR REGULAR JOB DUTIES.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, Line 15a
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS DETERMINES THE COMPENSATION FOR THE FOUNDATION'S EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR. THE BOARD REVIEWS THE PERFORMANCE OF THE EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR AND CONSIDERS COMPENSATION INFORMATION FOR LIKE POSITIONS IN SIMILAR SIZED ORGANIZATIONS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, Line 15b
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE CONTROLLER POSITION IS FILLED BY AN EMPLOYEE OF THE RELATED SCHOOL DISTRICT. THE FOUNDATION REIMBURSES THE SCHOOL DISTRICT FOR THIS POSITION BASED ON AN AGREED-UPON ALLOCATION OF A PORTION OF THE EMPLOYEE'S TIME. THE SCHOOL DISTRICT DETERMINES THE COMPENSATION OF THE EMPLOYEE.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Section C, Line 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE DOCUMENTS ARE ON FILE AT THE FOUNDATION'S BUSINESS OFFICE AND ARE AVAILABLE FOR INSPECTION UPON REQUEST.
